quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Seattle
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, john, drama. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who directed the movie Sleepless in Seattle?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nora Ephron

questions.question: Which of these movies did not involve Roberto Benigni?

options.text: Life is Beautiful (Vita è bella, La)

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Playtime

questions.question: This sci-fi movie was directed by James Cameron and filmed at a decommissioned power plant in England.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Aliens

questions.question: This sequel earned more at the box office than the original film. Its song Glory of Love was a #1 hit in the US and was nominated for an Oscar.

options.text: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Karate Kid II

questions.question: This black comedy was loosely based on the O. Henry short story The Ransom of Red Chief.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ruthless People

questions.question: This comedy, based on the life experiences of Rodney Ansell, won an Academy Award and three Golden Globes and spawned two sequels.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Crocodile Dundee

questions.question: This comedy, directed by John Landis, contains the line I know each one of you, like I know my own smell!
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: ¡Three Amigos!

questions.question: In the 1994 film Sleep With Me, Quentin Tarantino has a cameo in which he points out the homoerotic subtext of this 1986 action movie directed by Tony Scott.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Top Gun

questions.question: This war film won several Academy Awards and was written and directed by Oliver Stone.

options.text: Born on the Fourth of July

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Platoon

questions.question: Several scenes were cut from this drama directed by Adrian Lyne because the studio deemed them psychologically damaging.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 9½ Weeks

questions.question: This cult film was written and directed by David Lynch and had a budget of $6 million.

options.text: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Blue Velvet

questions.question: Who played the male lead in the movie Sleepless in Seattle?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Hanks

questions.question: Who played  the female lead in Sleepless in Seattle?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Meg Ryan

questions.question: When was the movie Sleepless in Seattle released?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1993

questions.question: This comedy, written and directed by John Hughes, starred an actor who was nominated for a Golden Globe.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ferris Buellers Day Off

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Seattle and Sleepless
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, john, following. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who sings As Time Goes By, the first song in the Sleepless in Seattle soundtrack?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jimmy Durante

questions.question: Louis Armstrong sings this great, old, romantic song on the Sleepless in Seattle soundtrack.

options.text: When Its Sleepy Time, Down South
A Kiss to Build a Dream On

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Kiss to Build a Dream On

questions.question: What important role in Sleepless in Seattle did Ross Malinger play?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The male protagonists son

questions.question: A cowboy song, performed by this cowboy/actor/singer/businessman, is heard when the male protagonist of the movie Sleepless in Seattle gets back to dating.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gene Autry

questions.question: Who played the female protagonists best friend in Sleepless in Seattle?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rosie ODonnell

questions.question: The movie Sleepless in Seattle runs 105 minutes. For how many minutes are the lead actor and lead  actress in the same scene?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2

questions.question: Although Hillary Clinton implied in CBS 60 minutes that she did not like this song, it was on the soundtrack to Sleepless in Seattle.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stand By Your Man

questions.question: Which one of the following happened to Tiny, a character from the movie House of 1000 Corpses?

options.text: His dad set the house on fire.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His dad set the house on fire.

questions.question: The male protagonist of Sleepless in Seattle and his friend, Greg, cry when seeing this movie.

options.text: All Quiet on the Western Front

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Dirty Dozen

questions.question: This song on the Sleepless in Seattle soundtrack is performed by Nat King Cole and contains the following lyrics:

options.text: d now the purple  dusk of  twilight time
ways reminding me that were apart.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stardust

questions.question: What do customers get free when they filled up at Captain Spauldings in the horror film House of 1000 Corpses?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chicken

questions.question: In the movie House of 1000 Corpses George Wydell interrogated Captain Spaulding.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Doctor John and Ricki Lee Jones sing this fun love song on the Sleepless in Seattle soundtrack.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Makin Whoopee

questions.question: Which character from the movie House of 1000 Corpses was made into Fish Boy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bill

questions.question: Who directed the horror film House of 1000 Corpses?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rob Zombie

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Film
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, cereal, eating. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the 2005 remake of The House of Wax, the wax museum was located in the real town of Ambrose, Louisiana.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: This Alfred Hitchcock movie has some of the most memorable chase scenes in movie history including a scene where Cary Grant is chased by a crop duster. Which Hitchcock movie ends with a climatic chase across the face of Mt. Rushmore?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: North by Northwest

questions.question: What cereal was Tiny eating in the horror film House of 1000 Corpses?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Agatha Crispies

questions.question: Did the action in the movie House of 1000 Corpses start on the night before Halloween of 1977?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: In the 1984 film Nightmare on Elm Street, Nancys house was really on Elm Street.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In a 1982 movie, Mel Gibson played a post-apocalyptic warrior named Mad Max. In what movie does Mad Max lead a convey driving a fuel-oil semi MACK truck chased by gasoline pirates?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Road Warrior

questions.question: Which film company released the movie House of 1000 Corpses?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lion Gate Films

questions.question: What is the name of the mansion in the 1940 movie Rebecca?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Manderly

questions.question: What is the name of the fictional town, which is the setting of the 1956 movie Invasion of the Body Snatchers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Santa Mira

questions.question: Its 106 miles to Chicago, weve got a full tank of gas, half a pack of cigarettes, its dark, and were wearing sunglasses sets the pace for this John Landis movie. Although the heroes of this movie are chased by policemen, firemen, The Good Ole Boys, and the Illinois National Guard, you never doubt their success because as one character explains, Were on a mission from God. What is the first name of Jake Joliet  Blues brother?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elwood

questions.question: The 1978 movie Halloween is set in the real town of Haddonfield, NJ.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In what California area was the 1982 film Poltergeist primarily shot?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Aqoura Hills

questions.question: This character may have forgotten his name but he remembered how to drive. His girlfriend,
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jason Bourne

questions.question: In the film House of 1000 Corpses, what were Grandpa and Otis watching on the TV when the police arrived?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Munsters

questions.question: Which of these is the sequel to the 2003 movie House of 1000 Corpses?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Devils Rejects

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Jackass
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, gon, jackass. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: From what movie directed by Stanley Kubrick is the quote Heres Johnny!?

options.text: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Shining

questions.question: Finish these lyrics from the song Karazy performed by Jackass star Chris Pontius:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Im feelin lazy

questions.question: What does Brandon DiCamillo, the stuntman from Jackass: The Movie, specialize in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Doing impressions

questions.question: What popular Texas city was The Texas Chainsaw Massacre filmed in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Austin

questions.question: Im gonna make him an offer he cant refuse is a quote from the 1972 movie The Godfather. What actor delivered the line?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marlon Brando

questions.question: Jackass star Dave England has only one of which of the following body parts?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Testicle

questions.question: Is Bruce Vito the uncle of professional skateboarder Bam Margera, who is famous as a member of the Jackass crew?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: What legendary Hollywood actress uttered the following lines in the 1981 movie On Golden Pond: Listen to me, mister. Youre my knight in shining armor. Dont you forget it. Youre going to get back on that horse, and Im going to be right behind you, holding on tight, and away were gonna go, go, go!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Katharine Hepburn

questions.question: What is the name of the fictional hotel that delinquents are sent to clean up in the 2006 movie See No Evil?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Blackwell

questions.question: Which character from the Star Wars saga first used the words May the Force be with you?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Obi-Wan Kenobi

questions.question: In Jackass: The Movie, when Johnny Knoxville is dressed as the old man and he is shoplifting he says that he was once the lover of which one of these people?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lon Cheney

questions.question: What bands music videos has Jackass director Jeff Tremaine also directed?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Turbonegro

questions.question: Where was daredevil performer Steve-O from Jackass: The Movie born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wimbledon, London

questions.question: The movie A Clockwork Orange was set  in Scotland in the year 2005, as imagined in 1965.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: From what famous movie is the quote Im the king of the world!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Titanic

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Animation and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, villain. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The flip book was an early attempt at animation. It was a book of stills that, when flipped, showed motion. When was this book first patented?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1868

questions.question: The first African-American man to get an Academy Award was an actor in a Disney animated movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In 1954 a British group released a full length animated version of this George Orwell novel.

options.text: Down and Out in London and Paris

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Animal Farm

questions.question: What actor said the popular line Mama always said life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what youre gonna get in an Oscar-winning 1994 movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Hanks

questions.question: This word is used  to signify a style of animation developed and advanced by Japanese animators.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: anime

questions.question: What popular movie villain uttered the words A census taker once tried to test me. I ate his liver with some fava beans and a nice Chianti?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hannibal Lecter

questions.question: The use of puppets for animation was first developed in this country.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Russia

questions.question: Which of the characters from the 1939 movie The Wizard of Oz says the phrase Theres no place like home?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dorothy

questions.question: This film, directed by Alfred Jackson, was released by Disney on December 21, 1937 and featured Billy Gilbert as Sneezy.

options.text: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

questions.question: 1973 saw the release of this full length animated film which featured the great actress Agnes Moorehead.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Charlottes Web

questions.question: In what movie did Robert De Niro deliver the famous line You talkin to me??
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Taxi Driver

questions.question: From which of the Terminator movies is the popular catchphrase Hasta la vista, baby?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

questions.question: What educational, non-fiction full length animated film was released in 1957?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hemo the Magnificent

questions.question: Did Colonel Billy Mitchell appear in a Walt Disney full length animated film?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: In this type of animation, a real, physical object is photographed. It is then moved very slightly and photographed again. Playing the series of frames as a continuous sequence, creates the illusion of motion.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: stop motion animation

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Comedy
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, title. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the difference between Felix and Oscar from the 1968 movie The Odd Couple?

options.text: Oscar loves animals, and Felix loves hunting.
Felix is a playboy, and Oscar is very shy.
Oscar is wealthy, and Felix is dirt-poor.
Felix is a neatfreak, and Oscar is a pig.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Felix is a neatfreak, and Oscar is a pig.

questions.question: Which of these actors did not appear in Woody Allens 1977 comedy movie Annie Hall?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jack Nicholson

questions.question: What Academy Award-winning actor starred in the 1967 comedy movie The Graduate?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dustin Hoffman

questions.question: What Robert Zemeckis movie was released in 1988?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Who Framed Roger Rabbit

questions.question: In which city is the apartment from the 1960 comedy movie The Apartment located?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New York City

questions.question: What historical figure does Charlie Chaplin satirize in his 1940 comedy movie The Great Dictator?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Mae Questel was one of the voice actors in the movie about Roger Rabbit. What is untrue about her?

options.text: She was the voice of Red Riding Hood in 1943s Red Hot Riding Hood.
She was the voice of Popeye.
She was the voice of Betty Boop.
She was the voice of Olive Oyl.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She was the voice of Red Riding Hood in 1943s Red Hot Riding Hood.

questions.question: What actress portrays Sally in the 1989 romantic comedy movie When Harry Met Sally...?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Meg Ryan

questions.question: What is the name of Eddie Murphys character in the 1984 comedy movie Beverly Hills Cop?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Axel Foley

questions.question: What is the name of the fish from the title of the 1988 comedy movie starring John Cleese?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wanda

questions.question: Steven Spielbergs wife, Kate Capshaw, provided the singing voice of Jessica, the female lead in the movie about Roger Rabbit.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the movie Friday the 13th, when Annie is trying to get to Camp Crystal Lake she stops at a small cafe to ask for direction. How far do they tell her the lake is from there?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 20 miles

questions.question: What does Professor Julius Kelp transform into in the 1963 comedy movie The Nutty Professor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A smooth womanizer

questions.question: What kind of animal is Baby from the 1938 comedy movie Bringing Up Baby?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Leopard

questions.question: When Enos drops Annie off at the crossroads in the film Friday the 13th, how far does she walk to get to Camp Crystal Lake?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: none of these
